name: JEP 455 - Primitive Types in Patterns, instanceof, and switch (Preview)
JEP 462 - Structured Concurrency (Second Preview)
dscr: Simplifies multithreaded programming by managing tasks in a structured scope. Demonstrates using StructuredTaskScope to manage subtasks as a single unit of work.

name: JEP 467 - Markdown Documentation Comments
dscr: Markdown is now allowed in Java comments for easier styling.

name: JEP 471 - Deprecate the Memory-Access Methods in sun.misc.Unsafe for Removal
dscr: No executable code, see DeprecateMemoryAccessMethods class for further info.

name: JEP 474 - ZGC: Generational Mode by Default
dscr: No executable code, see GenerationalZGC23.java for further info.

name: JEP 477 - Implicitly Declared Classes and Instance Main Methods (Third Preview)
JEP 481 - Scoped Values (Third Preview)
dscr: Scoped Values enable a method to share immutable data both within a thread and in child threads.

name: JEP 482 - Flexible Constructor Bodies (Second Preview)
dscr: Since Java 22, `super()` is no longer required to be placed as first statement in constructor.
